DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine randomize trial whether possible decrease discomfort mammography use analgesic ibuprofen , use script , supportive text informing patient mammography .
DOC.brief_title: Women 's Mammography Study To Improve Comfort During Mammography
DOC.detailed_description: This study design evaluate two method reduce pain discomfort cause mammography , one barrier procedure .
DOC.criteria: Must sign informed consent . Must either get first mammogram base prior experience expect level 4 5 pain May take ibuprofen pain medication within last 12 hour . Must contraindication take ibuprofen e.g : No history allergic reaction ibuprofen aspirin No recent history last year bleed GI tract Not pregnant suspect pregnant
